Reviews.Title: Polaroid's service in Canada is bad
Reviews.Author: FB
Reviews.Content: Polariod TV is less than 3 months old and has already broken.  In order to have your product repaired it must be shipped to their service locations and then they will replace it with a refurbished product.

Reviews.Title: Horrible.
Reviews.Author: Susan J. Olson "oldfolkiemom"
Reviews.Content: First off, the sound is incredibly horrible. The little speakers sound like tin cans. My cellphone has better speakers. It actually grates on my nerves to listen to this thing. And no matter how much adjusting for picture quality I did, the picture looked washed out and fuzzy. After 3 months of dealing with this cheap tv, I finally broke down and bought a Vizio. Best move I've ever made. Very happy with it.

ProductInfo.Features:
450:1 dynamic contrast ratio, 350 cd/m2 brightness and 16-ms. response time
Ensure deeper blacks, brighter whites and richer colors*
HDMI, component video, S-video, audio and VGA connections
Accommodate DVD players, camcorders, audio systems, computers and other gear*
